scripts.packages:install: npm install sequelize pg && npm install --save-dev sequelize-cli
scripts.db:reset: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --debug && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --debug
scripts.start: npm run packages:install && npm run db:reset && node ./bin/www
